00021         socket::Session_ptr AsioConnector::connect(const socket::Address_ptr addr)
00022         {
00023             ip::address address = ip::address::from_string(addr->host());
00024             ip::tcp::endpoint endpoint(address, addr->port());
00025 
00026             socket_ptr sock(new boost::asio::ip::tcp::socket(
00027                         _socketservice->_io_service));
00028             sock->connect(endpoint);
00029             AsioSession_ptr session = AsioSession::make(sock);
00030             _sessionRegistry->add(session);
00031             session->receiveEvents();
00032             return session;
00033         }
